query: SELECT oi.*, s.name as service_name, s.price as service_price FROM orderItems oi LEFT JOIN services s ON oi.serviceId = s.id WHERE oi.orderId = (SELECT id FROM orders ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1);
